EmailTemplate.description: PR SG, PR TH, PR MY
EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE Corp Card Pending to Submit Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Travel & Entertainment Claim form (Corp Card) {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} waiting for submit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
Your Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} has been approved by {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.ASI_TnE_Latest_Approver__c}.
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view the Travel & Entertainment form details.
